price: Maze yinyabya (mu ibanga) ku bigirwamana byabo, nuko aravuga ati “Ese ntimurya (aya mafunguro mwateguriwe)?”
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
